comments.body: I see at least two distinct tests in this one.  In the interest of smaller, more modular, testing, let's at least break it up here where I've commented.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +60,64 @@        msg = "read_size should be less or equal to max_buffer_size"
        with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=msg):
            Unpacker(read_size=5, max_buffer_size=3)

    def test_maxbuffersize_bufferfull(self):
